alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:07PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 930 PM EST... At 906 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Lakewood Park, or 11 miles west of Indrio, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South, and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
